verses.verse: In that <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H7892>song<s%> will be <S%H7891>sung<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah:<s%> "We have a <S%H5797>strong<s%> <S%H5892>city;<s%> He <S%H7896>sets<s%> up <S%H2346>walls<s%> and <S%H2426>ramparts<s%> for <S%H3444>security.<s%>
<S%H6605>"Open<s%> the <S%H8179>gates,<s%> that the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%> may <S%H935>enter,<s%> The one that <S%H8104>remains<s%> <S%H529>faithful.<s%>
"The <S%H5564>steadfast<s%> of <S%H3336>mind<s%> Thou wilt <S%H5341>keep<s%> in <S%H7965>perfect<s%> <S%H7965>peace,<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> he <S%H982>trusts<s%> in Thee.
<S%H982>"Trust<s%> in the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5703>forever,<s%> For in <S%H3050>God<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> [we have] an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H6697>Rock.<s%>

"For He has <S%H7817>brought<s%> <S%H7817>low<s%> those who <S%H3427>dwell<s%> on <S%H4791>high,<s%> the <S%H7682>unassailable<s%> <S%H7151>city;<s%> He <S%H8213>lays<s%> it <S%H8213>low,<s%> He <S%H8213>lays<s%> it <S%H8213>low<s%> to the <S%H776>ground,<s%> He <S%H5060>casts<s%> it to the <S%H6083>dust.<s%>
"The <S%H7272>foot<s%> will <S%H7429>trample<s%> it, The <S%H7272>feet<s%> of the <S%H6041>afflicted,<s%> the <S%H6471>steps<s%> of the <S%H1800>helpless.<s%>"

The <S%H734>way<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> is <S%H4339>smooth;<s%> O <S%H3477>Upright<s%> <S%H3477>One,<s%> <S%H6424>make<s%> the <S%H4570>path<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H6424>level.<s%>

<S%H637>Indeed,<s%> [while following] the <S%H734>way<s%> of Thy <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> We have <S%H6960>waited<s%> for Thee <S%H6960>eagerly;<s%> Thy <S%H8034>name,<s%> even Thy <S%H2143>memory,<s%> is the <S%H8378>desire<s%> of [our] <S%H5315>souls.<s%>

At <S%H3915>night<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H183>longs<s%> for Thee, <S%H637>Indeed,<s%> my <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H7130>within<s%> me <S%H7836>seeks<s%> Thee <S%H7836>diligently;<s%> For <S%H9201>when<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> experiences Thy <S%H4941>judgments<s%> The <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H8398>world<s%> <S%H3925>learn<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness.<s%>

[Though] the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> is <S%H2603>shown<s%> <S%H2603>favor,<s%> He does not <S%H3925>learn<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness;<s%> He <S%H5765>deals<s%> <S%H5765>unjustly<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H5228>uprightness,<s%> And does not <S%H7200>perceive<s%> the <S%H1348>majesty<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> Thy <S%H3027>hand<s%> is <S%H7311>lifted<s%> up [yet] they do not <S%H2372>see<s%> it. They <S%H2372>see<s%> [Thy] <S%H7068>zeal<s%> for the <S%H5971>people<s%> and are <S%H954>put<s%> to <S%H954>shame;<s%> <S%H637>Indeed,<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> will <S%H398>devour<s%> Thine <S%H6862>enemies.<s%>
<S%H3068>Lord,<s%> Thou wilt <S%H8239>establish<s%> <S%H7965>peace<s%> for us, <S%H3588>Since<s%> Thou hast <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H6466>performed<s%> for us <S%H3605>all<s%> our <S%H4639>works.<s%>

O <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> other <S%H113>masters<s%> <S%H2108>besides<s%> Thee have <S%H1166>ruled<s%> us; [But] through Thee <S%H905>alone<s%> we <S%H2142>confess<s%> Thy <S%H8034>name.<s%>

The <S%H4191>dead<s%> will not <S%H2421>live,<s%> the <S%H7496>departed<s%> <S%H7496>spirits<s%> will not <S%H6965>rise;<s%> <S%H3651>Therefore<s%> Thou hast <S%H6485>punished<s%> and <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> them, And Thou hast wiped out <S%H6>all<s%> <S%H3605>remembrance<s%> of them.

Thou hast <S%H3254>increased<s%> the <S%H1471>nation,<s%> O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> Thou hast <S%H3254>increased<s%> the <S%H1471>nation,<s%> Thou art <S%H3513>glorified;<s%> Thou hast <S%H7368>extended<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7099>borders<s%> of the <S%H776>land.<s%>
O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> they <S%H6485>sought<s%> Thee in <S%H9496>distress;<s%> They could only <S%H3908>whisper<s%> a <S%H3908>prayer,<s%> Thy <S%H4148>chastening<s%> was upon them.

As the <S%H2030>pregnant<s%> <S%H2030>woman<s%> <S%H7126>approaches<s%> [the time] to <S%H3205>give<s%> <S%H3205>birth,<s%> She <S%H9123>writhes<s%> [and] <S%H2199>cries<s%> out in her <S%H2256>labor<s%> <S%H2256>pains,<s%> <S%H3651>Thus<s%> were we <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> Thee, O <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

We were <S%H2029>pregnant,<s%> we <S%H9123>writhed<s%> [in labor], We <S%H3205>gave<s%> <S%H3205>birth,<s%> as it were, [only] to <S%H7307>wind.<s%> We could not <S%H6213>accomplish<s%> <S%H3444>deliverance<s%> for the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H1077>Nor<s%> were <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H8398>world<s%> <S%H5307>born.<s%>

Your <S%H4191>dead<s%> will <S%H2421>live;<s%> Their <S%H5038>corpses<s%> will <S%H6965>rise.<s%> You who <S%H7931>lie<s%> in the <S%H6083>dust,<s%> <S%H9516>awake<s%> and <S%H7442>shout<s%> for <S%H7442>joy,<s%> For your <S%H2919>dew<s%> is as the <S%H2919>dew<s%> of the <S%H9004>dawn,<s%> And the <S%H776>earth<s%> will <S%H5307>give<s%> <S%H5307>birth<s%> to the <S%H7496>departed<s%> <S%H7496>spirits.<s%>

<S%H1980>Come,<s%> my <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H935>enter<s%> into your <S%H2315>rooms,<s%> And <S%H5462>close<s%> your <S%H9088>doors<s%> <S%H1157>behind<s%> you; <S%H2247>Hide<s%> for a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H7281>while,<s%> <S%H5704>Until<s%> <S%H2195>indignation<s%> <S%H5674>runs<s%> [its] <S%H5674>course.<s%>

For <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is about to <S%H3318>come<s%> out from His <S%H4725>place<s%> To <S%H6485>punish<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> for their <S%H5771>iniquity;<s%> And the <S%H776>earth<s%> will <S%H1540>reveal<s%> her <S%H1818>bloodshed,<s%> And will <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>longer<s%> <S%H3680>cover<s%> her <S%H2026>slain.<s%>
